environment:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003enew_environment = client.environments('my_space_id').create(\n    'new_environment_id',\n    {\n        'name': 'New Environment'\n    }\n)\n\n# or if you entry:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003eentry_attributes = {\n    'content_type_id': 'target_content_type',\n    'fields': {\n        'title': {\n            'en-US': 'My Awesome Post'\n        },\n        'body': {\n            'en-US': 'Once upon a time...'\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nnew_entry = client.entries('my_space_id', 'environment_id').create(\n    'new_entry_id',\n    entry_attributes\n)\n\n# dir=\"auto\"\u003eUpdating an entry for multiple locales:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003efor target_locale in ['en-US', 'es-AR']:\n    entry.sys['locale'] = target_locale\n    entry.title = 'Post in content type:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003econtent_type_attributes = {\n    'name': 'Blog Post',\n    'description': 'Blog Posts to be included in ...',\n    'fields': [\n        {\n 'Symbol',\n            'validations': [\n                {\n                    'size': {'min': 3}\n                }\n            ]\n        },\n        {\n            'disabled': False,\n            'id': 'body',\n            'localized': True,\n            'name': 'Body',\n            'omitted': False,\n            'required': True,\n            'type': 'Text',\n            'validations': []\n        }\n    ]\n}\n\nnew_content_type = client.content_types('my_space_id', 'environment_id').create(\n    'new_ct_id',\n    content_type_attributes\n)\n\n# or if you already have a fetched })\n)\ncontent_type.save()\n\u003c/pre\u003e\n\u003cp dir=\"auto\"\u003eDeleting a content type:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003eclient.content_types('my_space_id', upload:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003e# you can use either a file-like object or a path.\n# If you use a path, the SDK will open it, create the upload and\n# close the file afterwards.\n\nwith space.uploads().create('path/to/file.txt')\n\u003c/pre\u003e\n\u003cp dir=\"auto\"\u003eAssociating an upload with a new asset:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cpre\u003e# notice that the upload is converted to a dir="auto"><code>api_url</code>: (optional) URL of the Contentful Target API, defaults to Management API.</p><p dir="auto"><code>uploads_api_url</code>: (optional) URL of the Contentful Upload Target API, defaults to Upload API.</p><p dir="auto"><code>api_version</code>: (optional) Target version of the Contentful API.</p><p dir="auto"><code>default_locale</code>: (optional) Default Locale for your Spaces, defaults to 'en-US'.</p><p dir="auto"><code>https</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to use https or http, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>authorization_as_header</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to send access_token through a header or via GET params, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>raw_mode</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to process the response or return it raw after each API call, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>gzip_encoded</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to accept gzip encoded results, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>raise_errors</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to raise an exception on requests that aren't successful, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>content_type_cache</code>: (optional) Boolean determining wether to store a Cache of the Content Types in order to properly coerce Entry fields, defaults to True.</p><p dir="auto"><code>proxy_host</code>: (optional) URL for Proxy, defaults to None.</p><p dir="auto"><code>proxy_port</code>: (optional) Port for Proxy, defaults to None.</p><p dir="auto"><code>proxy_username</code>: (optional) Username for Proxy, defaults to None.</p><p dir="auto"><code>proxy_password</code>: (optional) Password for Proxy, defaults to None.</p><p dir="auto"><code>max_rate_limit_retries</code>: (optional) Maximum amount of retries after RateLimitError, defaults to 1.</p><p dir="auto"><code>max_rate_limit_wait</code>: (optional) Timeout (in seconds) for waiting for retry after RateLimitError, defaults to 60.</p><p dir="auto"><code>application_name</code>: (optional) User application name, defaults to None.</p><p
